content.description: Sling Shot shares a start with "Knock-off" (V3). Instead of topping out left, continue up the face to pull a tricky cross to an incut sidepull. Dead point to the juggy pinch, downclimb, and repeat.
content.protection: 1 pad and a vigilant spotter. Beware of the poor landing on the left side of the boulder.
content.location: This problem tops out to the left of Knock-Off

content.description: Start low on a jug or undercling. Climb the face using incut crimps and a sweet friction sloper. Top out the boulder on the right side.
content.location: The pond boulder is the first boulder you'll see on the left side of the first pond passed while walking from the Whipple Hill parking lot.

content.description: Start on a jug rail before moving out left to a crimp. Move your feet left, and cross your right hand up to a decent crimp. Match the crimp, step your feet up, and then move out right to a small crimp, which resembles lichen. Bump up to a slopey finish, and match.
content.protection: One or two pads and a decent spotter.
content.location: This is to the right of Knock-off starting on a large, chalky jug rail.

content.description: This is a secluded boulder near larger, low, low angle boulders off the main walking path.
